attributes.action: Suspend Nigel Farage MEP, prevent him damaging future negotiations with Europe
attributes.additional_details:
48% of the voting population voted to Remain in the EU. Scotland, Northern Ireland, and Gibraltar all wanted to remain as full members.

These British Nations deserve the opportunity to represent themselves as part of a Britain that is 'wanting' to maintain ties with the EU. Not as one seeking to alienate itself further.

Please click on link to see the offensive way Farage speaks to the MEPs we are wanting to negotiate with in regards to our exit deal.

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=40ule97jkRA
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, understand that our Government took the decision to leave the EU. 48% did not want to break our ties with Europe.

Nigel Farage is not acting in Britain's best interest

Please suspend him with immediate effect so he cannot damage Britain's reputation further
